About Me

I am a self-starter who has entreprenurial ambitions and a strong interest to design, build and manage products. While complex engineering problems interest me, I am really passionate about creating applied solutions to solve real customer problems with business considerations. My expertise spans across both hardware and software development and I have had recent experience with deskptop, mobile and web development as well as microcontroller applications.

Experiences

Platoon Seargent

Jan 2016 - Nov 2017
Singapore Armed Forces

As part of my National Service commitments, I was conscripted into the Singapore Armed Forces. After completion of 3 months Basic Military Training, and 6 months of commander training in the Specialist and Warrant Officers institute I was given the rank of third seargent and was posted to an active infantry battalion.

  • Managed peacetime regimentation, discipline, and training of the Company HQ Platoon (55 men) and commanded a Man-Portable Anti-Tank Section (6 men)
  • Awarded Best Commander of the Quarter for successfully managing a security threat that arose during peacetime military operations at Jurong Island

Project Experience

Inventory Management System

Aug 2019 - Oct 2019
Java | JUnit | JavaFx

Course project as part of CS2113T module, where I was part of a team of 5 which developed a Java application to help lab technicians manage lab inventory. My reponsibilities included developing core features in Java as well as writing JUnit tests. I also developed UML diagrams and system diagrams for our product.

Key Features:

  • Ability to store stocks by their stock type and stock number
  • Tracks student loans and lost quantities and updates stock quantities
  • Auto generates loan list for each student

Android Fitness Application (Fitmate)

May 2019 - Aug 2019
React Native | Firebase | Tensorflow

Optional summer project hosted by NUS, supported by Google. Participated at the Apollo 11 level (highest level) under mentorship of a mentor from Thoughtworks. Created an Android fitness application (available on google play store as Fitmate).

Key features:

  • Allows users to record and send video challenges to peers of them doing push-ups, sit-ups or squats
  • A computer vision enabled machine learning algorithm periodically verifies count of number of repetitions
  • Users gain points by completing challenges and scores are reflected in a leader board

FPGA Audio Visualizer

Jan 2019 - May 2019
Verilog | C++ | C

FPGA audio visualiser consisting of an FPGA rendition of flappy bird game, frequency detector and interactive Audio Visualisation Coded in Verilog for the Basys3 FPGA. Uses a modmic 3 for audio input and the VGA output pins for video display.

Key features:

  • Audio Frequency Detector with an accuracy of +- 1Hz between 400 Hz and 10 kHz
  • FPGA rendition of the Flappy Bird game where birdâ€™s jump is controlled by amplitude of audio signal

Awards & Achievements

First Runner Up, IEEE Hackathon

Feb 2019
Unity | C++ | C#

Developed a Unity-based RPG game prototype that gamifies quizzes by teachers within 19 hours. My contributions included developing the boss battle scene using C# and Unity and writing a c++ command-line program to read and parse quiz input from teachers.

National Youth Achievement Award (NYAA)

Jan 2016 - Oct 2019

The NYAA Gold is a premier youth award given by the President to encourage young people who demonstrate self-reliance, perseverance and a sense of responsibility to themselves, to society and to nation

Over 18 months, I served in the National Rover Council, upgraded martial arts skills, took up competitive running, hiked in Indonesia for 15 days and directed a 2D1N residential course for young people to complete the requirements

OCBC Cares for the Environment Project

Apr 2018 - Aug 2018

A self-initiated environment project, where I was the Vice Chairperson. My team and I pitched and won a bid of $25,000 from the OCBC bank to fund our idea for reforestation of an ecologically sensitive Sarimbun forest and implementing an education program for young scouts nationally.
